original_text: And the king was exceedingly sorry, but because of his oaths and his guests he did not want to break his word to her.
korean_text: 왕이 심히 근심하나 자기가 맹세한 것과 그 앉은 자들로 인하여 그를 거절할 수 없는지라

sentences.original_text: And the king was exceedingly sorry
but because of his oaths and his guests
he did not want to break his word to her.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀에게 한 약속을 어기고 싶지 않았다
